content: प्रद्रु {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To run, run away, retreat or fly to (with <ab>acc.</ab> or <ab>abl.</ab>) रणात्प्रद्रवंति बलानि <ls>Ve. 4</ls>; <ls>Bk. 15. 79.</ls> {@--2@} To hasten away, rush towards. {@--3@} To assail, fall upon, attack. {@--4@} To attain. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To put to flight, rout.
